artist: Silversmith: Sebastian Henry Garrard; Retailer: Garrard & Co.
creditline: Gift of Jan and Bill Spoor
description: rectangular shape with clipped corners; decorated with flowers at rim and central scene of three hunters cornering a winged beast in a marsh with foliage; two birds overhead
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

on back at rim, stamped: [GARRARD & Co Ltd HAYMARKET LONDON]; on back below inscription, stamped: [SG (cat\'s head) (rampant lion) O]
title: Tray, from a toilette set
